Question: Shenzhen Yinchen Technology Co., Ltd CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Shenzhen Yinchen Technology Co., Ltd

Product Highlight:
- Shenzhen Yinchen Technology Co., Ltd showcased its new releases at the 2024 Consumer Electronics Show (CES) in Las Vegas, featuring innovative technologies in the field of mechanical keyboards and peripherals.

Specifications:
- Akko, a sub-brand of Shenzhen Yinchen Technology Co., Ltd, introduced various mechanical keyboards including the MOD007 PC, ACR TOP 40, V3 Pro Switches series, 5075S, 5075B v2 Plus series, Sailor Moon Crystal 5108B Plus, MonsGeek M1, SPR67, 5108S hotswap keyboard, and MOD006/MOD008.
- The company also launched keycaps with a variety of profiles, POM switches, and retailer switches in different colors.
- Akko collaborated with various brands such as Naruto, Dragon Ball, Naraka: Bladepoint, Tokidoki, Sanrio, Taiko no Tatsujin, Cinnamoroll, Doraemon, Hello Kitty, Honkai Impacts 3rd, One Piece, Bilibili, Spongebob, and more.

Email: support@akkogear.com
Hours: 9:30am-6:00pm UTC+8
